title: LibreOffice 24.2.1 Office Suite Is Out with More Than 100 Bug Fixes
description:
LibreOffice 24.2.1 is now available for download as the first point release to the LibreOffice 24.2 office suite series fixing more than 100 bugs for improved stability and robustness..

The post LibreOffice 24.2.1 Office Suite Is Out with More Than 100 Bug Fixes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
